verses.verse: The whole congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> assembled themselves together<WH6950> at Shiloh,<WH7887> and set up<WH7931> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> there.<WH776> The land was subdued<WH3533> before them.<WH6440>
Seven<WH7651> tribes<WH7626> remained<WH3498> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which had not yet divided<WH2505> their inheritance.<WH5159>

Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "How long will you neglect<WH7503> to go<WH935> in to possess<WH3423> the land,<WH776> which Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> has given you?<WH5414>

Appoint<WH3051> for yourselves three<WH7969> men<WH582> from each tribe.<WH7626> I will send<WH7971> them,<WH6965> and they shall arise, walk<WH1980> through the land,<WH776> and describe<WH3789> it according<WH6310> to their inheritance;<WH5159> and they shall come to me.<WH935>

They shall divide<WH2505> it into seven<WH7651> portions.<WH2506> Judah<WH3063> shall live<WH5975> in his borders<WH1366> on the south,<WH5045> and the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130> shall live<WH5975> in their borders<WH1366> on the north.<WH6828>

You shall survey<WH3789> the land<WH776> into seven<WH7651> parts,<WH2506> and bring<WH935> the description here to me;<WH3384> and I will cast lots<WH1486> for you here before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> our God.<WH430>

For the Levites<WH3881> have no portion<WH2506> among<WH7130> you;<WH3550> for the priesthood of Yahweh<WH3068> is their inheritance.<WH5159> Gad,<WH1410> Reuben,<WH7205> and the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> have received<WH3947> their inheritance<WH5159> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> eastward,<WH4217> which Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of Yahweh<WH3068> gave them.<WH5414>"

The men<WH582> arose<WH6965> and went.<WH3212> Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> those who went<WH1980> to survey<WH3789> the land,<WH776> saying,<WH559> "Go<WH3212> walk<WH1980> through the land,<WH776> survey<WH3789> it,<WH7725> and come again to me.<WH7993> I will cast lots<WH1486> for you here before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> in Shiloh.<WH7887>"

The men<WH582> went<WH3212> and passed through<WH5674> the land,<WH776> and surveyed<WH3789> it by cities<WH5892> into seven<WH7651> portions<WH2506> in a book.<WH5612> They came<WH935> to Joshua<WH3091> to the camp<WH4264> at Shiloh.<WH7887>

Joshua<WH3091> cast<WH7993> lots<WH1486> for them in Shiloh<WH7887> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> There Joshua<WH3091> divided<WH2505> the land<WH776> to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to their divisions.<WH4256>

The lot<WH1486> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> came up<WH5927> according to their families.<WH4940> The border<WH1366> of their lot<WH1486> went out<WH3318> between the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> and the children<WH1121> of Joseph.<WH3130>

Their border<WH1366> on the north<WH6828> quarter<WH6285> was from the Jordan.<WH3383> The border<WH1366> went up<WH5927> to the side<WH3802> of Jericho<WH3405> on the north,<WH6828> and went up<WH5927> through the hill country<WH2022> westward.<WH3220> It ended<WH8444> at the wilderness<WH4057> of Beth Aven.<WH1007>

The border<WH1366> passed<WH5674> along from there to Luz,<WH3870> to the side<WH3802> of Luz<WH3870> (the same is Bethel<WH1008>), southward.<WH5045> The border<WH1366> went down<WH3381> to Ataroth Addar,<WH5853> by the mountain<WH2022> that lies on the south<WH5045> of Beth Horon<WH1032> the lower.<WH8481>

The border<WH1366> extended,<WH8388> and turned<WH5437> around on the west<WH3220> quarter<WH6285> southward,<WH5045> from the mountain<WH2022> that lies before<WH6440> Beth Horon<WH1032> southward;<WH5045> and ended<WH8444> at Kiriath Baal<WH7154> (the same is Kiriath Jearim<WH7157>), a city<WH5892> of the children<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063> This was the west<WH3220> quarter.<WH6285>

The south<WH5045> quarter<WH6285> was from the farthest<WH7097> part of Kiriath Jearim.<WH7157> The border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> westward,<WH3220> and went out<WH3318> to the spring<WH4599> of the waters<WH4325> of Nephtoah.<WH5318>

The border<WH1366> went down<WH3381> to the farthest<WH7097> part of the mountain<WH2022> that lies before<WH6440> the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom,<WH2011> which is in the valley<WH6010> of Rephaim<WH7497> northward.<WH6828> It went down<WH3381> to the valley<WH1516> of Hinnom,<WH2011> to the side<WH3802> of the Jebusite<WH2983> southward,<WH5045> and went down<WH3381> to En Rogel.<WH5883>

It extended<WH8388> northward,<WH6828> went out<WH3318> at En Shemesh,<WH5885> and went out<WH3318> to Geliloth,<WH1553> which is over against<WH5227> the ascent<WH4608> of Adummim.<WH131> It went down<WH3381> to the stone<WH68> of Bohan<WH932> the son<WH1121> of Reuben.<WH7205>
It passed along<WH5674> to the side<WH3802> over against<WH4136> the Arabah<WH6160> northward,<WH6828> and went down<WH3381> to the Arabah.<WH6160>

The border<WH1366> passed along<WH5674> to the side<WH3802> of Beth Hoglah<WH1031> northward;<WH6828> and the border<WH1366> ended<WH8444> at the north<WH6828> bay<WH3956> of the Salt<WH4417> Sea,<WH3220> at the south<WH5045> end<WH7097> of the Jordan.<WH3383> This was the south<WH5045> border.<WH1366>

The Jordan<WH3383> was its border<WH1379> on the east<WH6924> quarter.<WH6285> This was the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> by the borders<WH1367> around<WH5439> it,<WH4940> according to their families.
Now the cities<WH5892> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> according to their families<WH4940> were Jericho,<WH3405> Beth Hoglah,<WH1031> Emek<WH6010> Keziz,<WH7104>
Beth Arabah,<WH1026> Zemaraim,<WH6787> Bethel,<WH1008>
Avvim,<WH5761> Parah,<WH6511> Ophrah,<WH6084>
Chephar Ammoni,<WH3726> Ophni,<WH6078> and Geba;<WH1387> twelve<WH8147> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>
Gibeon,<WH1391> Ramah,<WH7414> Beeroth,<WH881>
Mizpeh,<WH4708> Chephirah,<WH3716> Mozah,<WH4681>
Rekem,<WH7552> Irpeel,<WH3416> Taralah,<WH8634>

Zelah,<WH6762> Eleph,<WH507> the Jebusite<WH2983> (the same is Jerusalem<WH3389>), Gibeath,<WH1394> and Kiriath;<WH7157> fourteen<WH702> cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691> This is the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> according to their families.<WH4940>
